pinyin: Yi1 si1 lan2 Hui4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: (old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: The Organization of the Islamic Conference has been urging the United Nations to approve anti-defamation measures.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯蘭會議組織敦促聯合國儘快通過反誹謗措施。

sentences.english: The 56 member states of the Organisation of the Islamic Conference (OIC) have two.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯蘭會議組織的56個成員國擁有2所。

sentences.english: This year it heads the Organization for the Islamic Conference.
sentences.chinese: 今年哈將繼續主持伊斯蘭會議組織。

sentences.english: The Organization of the Islamic Conference has been urging the United Nations to approve anti-defamation measures.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯蘭會議組織一直在敦促聯合國通過反中傷措施。
